General.Name: Shanghai Fortune Techgroup Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Fortune Techgroup Co., Ltd. provides semiconductor products and solutions in China. Its products include wired and wireless communications, radio frequency and power amplifier type of components, sensors and others, as well as module for NBIoT (5G) usage. It provides various solutions for smart home, smart cities, surveillance, and finger print identification applications. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Shanghai, China.

2.Name: Mr. Jun  Pang
2.Title: VP, Sec. of the Board & Non Independent Director
